overview: When Kris's partner Jess comes home from an evening out, the night takes an unexpected turn. Kris, struggling with the surprise death of an ex-lover, side steps Jess's post gin and tonic come on's and inadvertently reveals too much. In the wake of Jess's insecurity the two of them may have to deal with the past instead of the present issue at hand.
title: Soft Spot
